name: Floodplain Activation Return Interval (years)
functionStatement: Moderate floods (~12 yr) activate benches/floodplain where valley setting allows.
descriptionMarkdown: Return interval for first meaningful overbanking/bench inundation (lower is better).
howToMeasureMarkdown: Estimate stage/discharge of bench overtopping; determine recurrence interval from gage/regional curves.

inputs.label: Floodplain Activation Return Interval (years)
inputs.helpMarkdown: Gage record or regional hydrology + bankfull indicators/HEC-RAS stage mapping.

sourceMetadata.metricDataSource: Gage record or regional hydrology + bankfull indicators/HEC-RAS stage mapping.
sourceMetadata.metricStatement: Moderate floods (~12 yr) activate benches/floodplain where valley setting allows.
sourceMetadata.description: Return interval for first meaningful overbanking/bench inundation (lower is better).
sourceMetadata.howToMeasure: Estimate stage/discharge of bench overtopping; determine recurrence interval from gage/regional curves.
referencesRaw: SFARI rapid assessment; USGS gage data (where available); bankfull field guides.

stratifications.name: Proposed (derived from SFARI rapid curves) - Exclude naturally confined reaches where overbanking is not expected.
stratifications.stratification: Exclude naturally confined reaches where overbanking is not expected.
